thread.section_title: Hotel Boutique At Grand Central - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A lovely stay
thread.title_full: A lovely stay - Review of Hotel Boutique At Grand Central, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: jcco270
title: A lovely stay
text: I stayed here in February with my other half for a week and found it to be a really pleasant experience. The location was perfect, across the road from grand central station and the staff were polite and professional. The room was cosy and we slept well. Would recommend for a nice, no frills and comfortable stay in NYC.
